body:
Hello
I took two series of photos, in raw format and Jpeg with canon Rebel T2i and fisheye lens 4.5 mm, of a light source. I fused jpeg images to HDR and it gave me the correct luminance (close to the measured luminance in the scene ,CF=0.92), then I generated another HDR image with raw2hdr but the luminance value of this HDR was a way off the actual luminance.  What can be the possible problem ? Thank you
___
